description:
Shahar was originally a human who became a vampire, like http://anidb.net/ch70946 [Mikaela Hyakuya]. However, he feels extreme guilt towards his dead sister, Lana, and events during his life as a human may have contributed him to becoming insane and thinking http://anidb.net/ch83614 [Riko] is his dead sister. He kidnaps Riko and becomes a wanted criminal chased by both http://anidb.net/ch71717 [Shinoa]`s squad and vampire city guards.
Source: Owari no Seraph Wiki
name: Shahar
